# GetAddress

**Instance Method**

Returns the address of the memory block.

## Declaration

```swift
uint64_t GetAddress();
```

## Return Value

The address of the first byte of the memory block in the current process.

## Getting the Map Attributes

- **GetLength**: Returns the length of the memory block in bytes.
- **GetOffset**: Returns the offset from the original start of the memory block.
